root.name: WolfTeam
root.description: Overview WolfTeam is a fast-paced First Person Shooter. What makes this game unique is that the players are able to transform between a humans and werewolves. Werewolves have the advantage of being able to run on wolves and in some modes, the wolves are even able to become invisible. Game ModesThere are 4 game modes in WolfTeam: Destruction In Destruction mode, the red team must plant the bomb and the blue team must prevent the red team from planting (or defuse the bomb if it is planted) DeathmatchThis is a basic deathmatch, one team must reach the kill limit before the other one does to win. Ice HoldThe goal of Ice Hold is to eliminate all members of the opposing team before the time runs out. The team with the most rounds won will win the game. Conquest The objective of the conquest mode is to capture as many bases as possible before the time runs out
